header.title: httpd_custom_api

erlref.modulesummary: Behaviour with optional callbacks to customize the inets HTTP server.

description.p: The module implementing this behaviour shall be supplied to to the servers configuration with the option customize

func.name: response_default_headers() -> [Header]
func.fsummary: Provide default headers for the HTTP servers responses.

type.d: string:to_lower/1 will be performed on the HeaderName

desc.p: Provide default headers for the HTTP servers responses. Note that this option may override built-in defaults.

func.name: response_header({HeaderName, HeaderValue}) -> {true, Header} | false
func.fsummary: Filter and possible alter HTTP response headers.

type.d: The header name will be in lower case and should not be altered.

desc.p: Filter and possible alter HTTP response headers before they are sent to the client.

func.name: request_header({HeaderName, HeaderValue}) -> {true, Header} | false
func.fsummary: Filter and possible alter HTTP request headers.

type.d: The header name will be in lower case and should not be altered.

desc.p: Filter and possible alter HTTP request headers before they are processed by the server.
